name: StudentCore-Students-GET-getResidencies
description: [Student Core] GET /students/{ID}/residencies — Retrieves a collection of residence information for the specified student ID.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: institutionalAcademicUnit
schema.description: The Institutions.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.description: Whether the holds are active or not.

schema.name: holdReason
schema.description: The hold reason to filter on.

schema.name: holdType
schema.description: The hold types to filter on.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. description: [Student Core] GET /students — Retrieves a collection of students.

schema.name: academicLevel
schema.description: query parameter: academicLevel

schema.name: academicUnit
schema.description: Derived Academic Units.

schema.name: activeOnly
schema.description: Only return active students.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: programOfStudy
schema.description: For students who haven't matriculated, the program of study they either applied to or have been admitted to. For matriculated students, the primary program of study from their reporting record.

schema.name: search
schema.description: A fuzzy search string that matches student IDs and names. Example: search=bri%20book returns the student Brian Booker.
